dialogues: The Dertian Secret Agency has identified a malicious hacker who gained unauthorized access to a cryptocurrency exchange. He is using Bitcoins to buy smuggled weapons.
The hacker is now staying at his mansion secured by armed guards.
Your mission, agent 67, is to infiltrate the mansion and eliminate the malicious hacker. Make sure to stay out of the guards' sight and secure a safe exit route after taking down the target.
Good luck on your mission, agent 67.
You have successfully stopped the relentless hacker. The Dertian Secret Agency has always trusted your skills.
Patience and caution are keys to a successful mission and a professional assassin.
